practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Car Accidents|Slip and Fall|Wrongful Death|Dog Bites|Assault and Battery|Product Liability|Medical Malpractice
description:
From our law office in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, the dedicated attorneys at Rosen Justice provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients throughout Philadelphia, Delaware, Montgomery and Bucks counties who have suffered serious injuries or lost loved ones due to others' negligent, careless or unlawful actions. With an additional office in Jenkintown, we have become one of our region's most prominent law firms for those who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Wrongful death
  • Dog bites
  • Assault and battery injuries
  • Medical malpractice
  • Products liability
  • SEPTA accidents
  • Slip-and-fall accidents
  • Other preventable tragedies

Combined, our lawyers possess more than 75 years of legal experience, and we have earned national recognition as being among the top trial advocates in the country. During our time in practice, we have gained a reputation for the highly personalized attention we provide to all we serve. What's more, we have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff clients.

Devoted to helping you make your life whole again following an avoidable incident that has left you or a loved one suffering needlessly, our lawyers promise to fight hard on your behalf in a relentless pursuit of justice. We also genuinely care about you and your family, and we are fully prepared to do whatever we can to help you through this very difficult and stressful time in your life.

To begin the process, you can contact Rosen Justice to take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations in these uncertain times to help keep you safe and healthy.
